titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to change the composition of the northern and central districts of Illinois.
To amend title 28, United States Code, to change the composition of the northern and central districts of Illinois.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

bill.summary:
Amends the federal judicial code to change the composition of the Northern and Central Districts of Illinois.
Removes Whiteside County from the Western Division of the Northern District and places it in the Central District.
